Name: Bone Relief of Aphrodite with Dolphin
Description: The fine relief carved in bone depicts Aphrodite after her bath, standing on a base. Beside her right leg is a dolphin, her right hand is under her breast, and she is covering herself with her left hand.The left leg is broken, but the body is well proportioned, displaying the beauty attested to Aphrodite. Ivory and bones were used to decorate pieces of furniture.
